values: I know that I bitch about my parents a lot. But I have to be fair. Somtimes my mom is pretty cool about things. Last summer when Krogers Had a sail on Flank Steak. So my mom stocked the freezer with them. She is letting me have a few fro friday night. Me and the night possy are hitting the campground under cover of the night, and with our Hibatchi we'll just be taking the chill of the meat and eating them just like we like them. Bloody! I love when the blood drips down my face like I am feeding on some unsuspecting victum of the night! that's wow I like me red meat. the redder, the deader, the better!

How can you stand living my your parents moral rules? They may be fine for the children of the light! but some of us are wise behond our time on this plane. Still my parents feel that they must contain me in this suburban hell. I crave the night. The night is where I truley live. Why can they not except that. I would except them.

I prey my time is short in this world.

Greetings children of the day world. I have decided to journal my walk through the waking hours of this light dimensions. I await the night, and it's eternal bliss and misery. Until then, I will assimilate with the light humans and make those connections that the humans crave. I mean no harm, and accept of most people. If you want to friend me, add me to your firends list and I will add you unto mine. I can be talked to like most mortals, do not fear me.
